abstract: Freedom Partners, an association linked to the billionaires Charles and David Koch, will begin a new lobbying effort pressuring lawmakers to shut down the bank, a top target of conservative activists and outside groups.

headline.main: Koch-Backed Group Bolsters Effort to Shut Down Export-Import Bank

snippet: Freedom Partners, an association linked to the billionaires Charles and David Koch, will begin a new lobbying effort pressuring lawmakers to shut down the bank, a top target of conservative activists and outside groups.
